column3: 2015 memory wall service info photos / videos mr. kester thomas jarrell
column9: at northern hospital of surry county. mr. jarrell was born june 8
column12: one of four children born to the late fred r. and cena sutphin jarrell. kester served our country in the united states army during the korean conflict era. he co-owned and operated jarrell's general store for many
column13: many years. he is survived by his wife of 54 years
column14: rachael snow jarrell of the home; a son and daughter-in-law
column15: will and katarina jarrell of mount airy; two grandsons
column17: both of mount airy; two sisters
column18: mildred jarrell and margaret jarrell smith
column19: both of mount airy; and a brother and sister-in-law
column20: norris g. and faye jarrell of mount airy. the funeral service will be held monday
column23: at 11:00 am at calvary baptist church
column24: with the rev. alex l. martin and the rev. justin nelson officiating. burial will follow at skyline memory gardens
column25: with military honors by the vfw memorial honor guard. the family will receive friends monday from 9:30 until 11:00 am at the church. the family wishes to express their gratitude for the love and compassion shown by dr. david dixon and the skilled nursing staff at northern hospital of surry county. in lieu of flowers
column26: memorial contributions may be made to mountain valley hospice and palliative care
column30: nc 27030. moody funeral services in mount airy is serving the family.
